BosonKit.bosonAnalogRead: Read value from BOSON analog sensor
BosonKit.bosonAnalogWrite: Write analog value(0-1023) to BOSON analog sensor
BosonKit.bosonDigitalRead: Read value from BOSON digital sensor
BosonKit.bosonDigitalWrite: Write digital value(0/1) to BOSON digital sensor
BosonKit.M011_00184_init: Initialize a given number of LEDs on the RGB LED strip at a specific pin
BosonKit.M011_00184_brightness: Set the brightness of RGB lights
BosonKit.M011_00184_ledRange: The LED positions where you wish to begin and end
BosonKit.M011_00184_setIndexColor: The designated LED shows a given color
BosonKit.M011_00184_showColor: All LEDs show a given color
BosonKit.M011_00184_shift: Shift LEDs forward and clear with zeros
BosonKit.M011_00184_rgb: Convert red, green and blue channels into a RGB color
BosonKit.setServoAngle: Servo rotates to a specific angle
